data.description:
Become a DJ! Play on official Pioneer DJ equipment. Learn from the masters at the Pete Tong DJ Academy. Join daily workshops. Connect with the community. Perform to the world.

Subscribe for your free 7-day trial:
- Play on official Pioneer DJ equipment
- Learn from the masters at the Pete Tong DJ Academy.
- Load your own music - including via Dropbox
- Access tracks from Beatport, Monstercat, TIDAL & Soundcloud Go+
- Join live workshops - more than 30 per week
- Level up your skills with game mode tutorials
- Livestream to Twitch directly from your Meta Quest
- Join multiplayer rooms and jam together

If you decide to cancel, no worries, you can keep mixing with a free, limited version of Tribe.
- Play with the starter decks
- Mix up to 5 tracks per session
- Join multiplayer sessions
- Continue learning with the 5 day DJ challenge
You can always re-subscribe when you’re ready.

Join the community on Discord | discord.gg/tribexr

Start your DJ journey today!

changelog.change_log:
**0.11.1.1 Hotfix**
- Added messaging and restrictions for TIDAL's DJ Extension Requirement
- Fixed bug that caused lessons to make dashboard disappear

**0.11.0**
- Added a stage queue to video calls, which automates DJs in the call taking turns sharing their mix.
- Added better moderation for multiplayer rooms:
    - Guests joining the room will be in the audience by default and cannot manipulate the decks
    - Guests have to request or be invited behind the decks by the room's host before they can DJ
    - Audience members that walk into the decks or the DJ's space will not be visible to anyone
- Track folders now remember your last position in the list, so you do not need to scroll from the top again when returning to a large folder
- Fixed leaderboards taking a long time to refresh when first starting Tribe
- Misc bug and rare crash fixes

- Added a stage queue to video calls, which automates DJs in the call taking turns sharing their mix.
- Added better moderation for multiplayer rooms:
    - Guests joining the room will be in the audience by default and cannot manipulate the decks
    - Guests have to request or be invited behind the decks by the room's host before they can DJ
    - Audience members that walk into the decks or the DJ's space will not be visible to anyone
- Track folders now remember your last position in the list, so you do not need to scroll from the top again when returning to a large folder
- Fixed leaderboards taking a long time to refresh when first starting Tribe
- Misc bug and rare crash fixes

+ Pioneer DJ DDJ-FLX4
+ Leaderboards
+ Desktop Mode
+ Redesigned Achievements List
+ Various Bugfixes

- Added Tidal integration
- Added ability to refresh folders for streaming services
- Fixed Beatport/Tidal playlists scrolling for large playlists 
- Added copyright notices in music/streaming menus
- Small Bug Fixes

+Visual Packs
+Custom Skins for Vinyl and Starter Decks
+Hot Cues displayed on all Waveforms
+Various Bugfixes

- Beatport Streaming on Meta Quest (requires BP Advanced subscription)
- Phase Meter for better beat matching
- Cue & Play with one hand interaction
- Multiplayer Hot Cues improvements
- More quality of life fixes

- Pete Tong DJ Academy - Carl Cox edition
- Control VFX
- Volume Control in Video Calls
- Video Call Spectator Mode
- Drum Machine Multiplayer Fixes
- Android SDK update

*Data migration to new save location
*Fixed crash at hour mark when using rooms
*Master level knob is now local per player in rooms
*New recordings folder in Documents instead of the Music folder. 
*Fixed an issue that allowed recordings to be renamed to overwrite other recordings on Android
*Fixed error text display when trying to rename a recording to a new name that’s already taken

- Drum machine
- 5 Day DJ Challenge
- Fixed an issue with the Workshops button being clickable outside of workshop times
- Various crash fixes.

- Fixes for Dropbox in multiplayer
- General multiplayer improvements
- Fixed various issues related to multiplayer and networked sessions.

Tribe is launching a new subscription service!
All premium features in Tribe are available through a single subscription tier. 
Includes all music packs, equipment, environments, livestreaming, workshops and more.
Folks who already purchased Tribe will be grandfathered in and receive a Tribe for Life. 
To learn more, join us on Discord (discord.gg/tribexr)
----
Includes log in fixes.

Tribe is launching a new subscription service!
All premium features in Tribe are available through a single subscription tier. 
Includes all music packs, equipment, environments, livestreaming, workshops and more.
Folks who already purchased Tribe will be grandfathered in and receive a Tribe for Life. 
To learn more, join us on Discord (discord.gg/tribexr)

- Restored the Friends list and Multiplayer invite functionality
- Menu adjustments
- Fixed Twitch Login issues
- Various Bug fixes

New Features
- New User Interface
- Tribe OG Badge!

Fixes
- Fixed video call leave button not working
- Fixed close room button to kick all the players in the room
- Fixed Twitch login menu going blank if login fails instead of showing instructions to get a new access token like it should
- If logging into the backend fails it should timeout a lot faster, to avoid issues like that avatars list not appearing

- New User Interface
- Tribe OG Badge!

- Sign up for web profile on Steam
- Steam & Oculus cross-play
- Fix for sort by BPM
- Game mode visuals optimizations

-  New deck menu 
-  Animated cameras
-  Use Epic Online Services for multiplayer
-  Play game mode while in video calls
-  New deck visuals in Game Mode
-  Create your DJ Profile
-  Continuous movement in game mode
